name: City Forest Bathing :)
description: Forest bathing in the city?! :) Just past the beautiful bridges and townscape of Lucerne is the newly reopened Gütsch funicular - or if you like, take a 10 minute walk up into the woods and then to a special view of Mount Rigi. :) This is literally a breath of fresh air up and beyond the city streets. Perfect if you happen to have an hour or two for a forest bath with a relaxing alpine view! If you have been travelling or need a break, this is a great way to stretch, relax, exercise, breathe, and just immerse yourself in nature for a memorable taste of Lucerne.
